body:
Comment 2 by **jjinux@google.com**: 
Thank you for your response.  It's definitely confusing to say that if ok is true, then
there must be an error.  In any case, I'd still suggest you add a sentence or two.  You
say that it's supposed to be teaching the idiom; if that is true, then please, add a
sentence or two to teach the idiom :)
